attributes.comment:
We are fed-up! As citizens of the United States who are trying to make a
difference in this worldl by helping others...why must we continue to be penalized!

I have just less than a year ago paid for both my husbands and my fingerprints.
We have paid a considerable sum ALL FOR NOTHING! Only to be told again that
we must pay again. There has been no changes in our lives...we have not
committed a crime since our last fingerprints were taken...so why must we repeat
the same costly process again? This is a scam as for as I am concerned!
Yes, I am angry, but more so, I am confused and feel scammed! Not only are we
being required to repeat the same process but now we are being required to pay
more...FOR WHAT! We are not rich or even wealthy...we live from paycheck to
paycheck like most of the rest of the world. Why are we made to suffer because
we want to help raise a child who have no parents! If anything the government
should be commending us and offering to help us help others. Instead we are
being scammed by our own government!
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Ovada M. Anderson
